description: Four fortnightly quizzes covering lecture material (DNA replication, transcription, translation, gene expression, molecular techniques). Includes multiple-choice, short answer, and essay questions. Conducted via Moodle/Inspera during tutorial sessions.

7-page scientific report analyzing simulated data from Lab 4 experiments on gene expression. Requires interpretation of results, literature references, and professional scientific communication. Submitted via Turnitin.

2-hour invigilated test covering laboratory theory, calculations, methodologies, safety protocols, and expected outcomes from all practical classes. Includes multiple-choice and short-answer questions. Conducted on-campus in Week 10.

2-hour invigilated exam assessing all lecture content (nucleic acid structure, gene regulation, molecular techniques). Features multiple-choice, short answer, and essay questions. Conducted during official exam period.
